sections.title: Holy Vindicator (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Holy Vindicator class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiencies (Holy Vindicator)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with all simple and martial weapons, plus all armor and shields except tower shields.

sections.title: Spells per Day (Holy Vindicator)
sections.description: Advances spellcasting progression from a previous divine spellcasting class at indicated levels, gaining spells per day and caster level but no other class features.

sections.title: Channel Energy (Su) (Holy Vindicator)
sections.description: Holy vindicator levels stack with other classes that grant channel energy for determining channel energy dice and uses per day.

sections.title: Vindicator’s Shield (Su) (Holy Vindicator)
sections.description: Channel energy into a shield as a standard action to grant sacred or profane AC bonus equal to channel dice for 24 hours or until struck in combat.

sections.title: Stigmata (Su) (Holy Vindicator)
sections.description: Activate bleeding wounds that cause bleed damage but grant sacred/profane bonuses to various rolls, with activation time improving at higher levels.

sections.title: Faith Healing (Su) (Holy Vindicator)
sections.description: Cure wounds spells cast on self are automatically empowered at 3rd level and maximized at 8th level without using higher spell slots.

sections.title: Divine Wrath (Sp) (Holy Vindicator)
sections.description: Upon confirming a critical hit, sacrifice a 1st-level spell to cast doom as an immediate action with DC bonuses based on weapon critical multiplier.

sections.title: Bloodfire (Su) (Holy Vindicator)
sections.description: While stigmata bleed, Channel Smite deals +1d6 damage and inflicts sickened condition plus bleed damage on failed saves.

sections.title: Channel Smite (Holy Vindicator)
sections.description: Gains Channel Smite as a bonus feat at 5th level.

sections.title: Versatile Channel (Su) (Holy Vindicator)
sections.description: Channel energy can be shaped into a 30-foot cone or 120-foot line instead of the normal radius.

sections.title: Divine Judgment (Sp) (Holy Vindicator)
sections.description: When reducing a creature to negative hit points with melee attack, sacrifice a 2nd-level spell to cast death knell as an immediate action.

sections.title: Bloodrain (Su) (Holy Vindicator)
sections.description: While stigmata bleed, harmful channel energy deals +1d6 damage and inflicts sickened condition plus bleed on failed saves.

sections.title: Divine Retribution (Sp) (Holy Vindicator)
sections.description: Upon confirming a critical hit, sacrifice a 3rd-level spell to cast bestow curse as an immediate action, usable even when incapacitated.
